root.name: Targ
root.description: Targ takes place in the futuristic place called "Crystal City" or in other words blue square with 81 yellow squares (9x9 grid). The player plays as a "Wummel" that looks like a little green car that drives around the grid shooting the red triangular "Targs." Occasionally the "Spectar Smuggler" appears and shooting it is worth extra points. The game is over when the player dies by the Targs or defeats all the Targs on the board. If the player takes too long the Targs increase in speed until the game ends and the next round starts. The game sales were good enough to spawn a sequel named Spectar.
